title: Basic Usage
content: Attribute action (type: String) upload server address.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Set Component Size
content: The options are large, medium, small, and mini
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: File types that can be uploaded
content: You can configure accept(image) to restrict the format of uploaded files to image
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Manual Upload
content: Configure the upload address through action and manually upload through submit
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Do not delete files
content: :before-remove (callback event before removing a file). In the method, return true/false indicates whether the file can be deleted.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Do not upload files
content: before-upload (callback event before upload). In the method, return true/false indicates whether files can be uploaded.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Upload Request
content: You can set action to the upload address and headers to the header request information
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: mini mode
content: You can configure mini-mode to set the display mode.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Whether files can be uploaded by dragging
content: drag(type:boolean) can be configured to control whether a component can drag files to upload. If the accept attribute is configured, the @drop-error event can be used to obtain non-compliant dragged files.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Drag Upload
content: The drag(type:boolean) parameter can be set to control whether the component can drag files.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Uploaded File List
content: You can use show-file-list to configure whether to display the list of uploaded files. The default value is true. This parameter must be used together with file-list. You can configure :file-list (type: Object) to display the name and address of the uploaded file
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: The list of uploaded files is displayed.
content: Use list-type = thumb to enable the display of the file list pop-up window, and thumbOption to set the data related to the pop-up window.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Customized upload request
content: Configure headers to customize the upload request header information
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Override the default request
content: You can configure http-request to overwrite the default upload behavior. You can customize the upload implementation
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Maximum Upload Limit
content: Configurable: before-upload (event callback before upload), restricting the file type and size
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Photo Wall
content: Set list-type to 'picture-card' to enable the photo wall mode
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: File Thumbnail
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Image List Thumbnail
content: You can set list-type to "picture" to display the picture list thumbnail
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Maximum number of files to be uploaded
content: You can set limit (type:Number, an integer greater than 0) to limit the number of files to be uploaded.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Multiple File Selection
content: The default file selection is single. You can set multiple to'true' to select multiple files.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Hook Function
content: before-remove: indicates the hook before deleting files. The parameters are the uploaded files and file list. If false is returned or Promise is returned and rejected, the deletion stops. before-upload Hook before uploading a file. The parameter is the uploaded file. If false is returned or Promise is returned and rejected, the upload stops.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Event
content: preview Event triggered when an uploaded file is clicked in the file list. removeEvent triggered when a file is removed from the file list. errorEvent triggered when a file fails to be uploaded. exceed Event triggered when the number of files exceeds the upper limit. progressEvent triggered when a file is uploaded. changeThis event is triggered when the file status changes. It is triggered when a file is added, uploaded successfully, or uploaded unsuccessfully. success Event triggered when a file is successfully uploaded.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Cookie credential information can be sent.
content: You can set with-credentials ='true' to enable the server to carry cookies. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Manually clear the list of uploaded files.
content: Invoke the clearFiles method of the component to clear the list of uploaded files. (This method cannot be invoked in before-upload.)
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Manually cancel the upload request
content: Invoke the abort method of the component to cancel the upload request
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Customized Upload Prompt
content: You can customize the upload prompt through the tip slot
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Customized trigger file option box
content: You can write a slot named trigger in the component to trigger the pop-up file selection box
findIntroStr: You can set the file type and number of uploaded files. You can customize the upload service.

title: Obtain the original size of the uploaded video.
